translation.Share Omong Message: Invitation to join Omong - Indonesia's own Social Media!
translation.Share Community Message2: community on Omong - Indonesia's Own Community
translation.Review Request Text: If you are enjoying Omong, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? Thanks for your Support!
translation.I have read and agree to the: I have read and agree to the
translation.Tutorial Page2 Point1: Omong is a place where you can share anything that you find interesting on the internet with a community that's interested in the topic
translation.Tutorial Page2 Point2: You can share content including images, links, videos or text posts to an existing community (check the search bar) or create a brand new community and let users find it
translation.Tutorial Page3 Point1: You receive hearts when your posts and comments are upvoted by community members
translation.Tutorial Page3 Point2: Hearts represent your reputation in Omong and you can unlock features in Omong as you gain more hearts
translation.Tutorial Page3 Point3: Hearts may also be used to elect new admins to communities
translation.Empty Home Feed Point1: Vote on posts to assist communities in bringing the best content to the top
translation.Empty Home Feed Point2: Join communities to keep this home feed up to date and filled with fresh content
translation.Empty Home Feed Point3: Create awesome posts and comments to make your community happy and win more hearts
translation.Grow Community Point1: 1) Invite users to join your community from their profile page in Omong
translation.Grow Community Point2: 2) Let others know about the community by sharing the community's invite link on various social media platforms
translation.Grow Community Point3 Part2: in comments of relevant posts to help more people discover the community
translation.Grow Community Point4: 4) You can also increase the community ranking to show up in the top community recommendation by creating content and engagement regularly
translation.You haven't joined any communities yet: You haven't joined any communities yet
translation.User Block Confirmation Detail: You won't be able to see posts and comments from this user and they won't be able to see your posts and comments on Omong. We won't let them know that you've blocked them
translation.Community Leave Confirmation Detail: Posts from this community won't show up in your home feed
translation.Interested in creating community: Would you like to create a community on this topic?
translation.Please login or create an account to cre: Please login or create an account to create posts
